scenes.description: Bob shrugs. 'If you can't always be available, shouldn't we hire more staff to cover such gaps?'

options.text: Hiring more staff could work, but we need to ensure they are properly trained.
options.analysis: You agree with the suggestion and emphasize the importance of training, showing good self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: I agree, but we should also focus on improving our current team's skills.
options.analysis: You show empathy and emotional perception by focusing on skill improvement, but motivation to hire is lower.

options.text: Hiring more staff is not always feasible. We need a more sustainable solution.
options.analysis: You prioritize sustainability and show strong self-regulation, but empathy and emotional perception could be improved.
